title: I AM WOMAN: Mental Health and Men In Skirts
description:
Michi Marshall, Kijafa Vick, Aja Crowder, Sharelle Rosado and Terricka Cromartie are back and kickoff episode 2 of I AM WOMAN. The cast exercise mental health check-ins and rate their current status on a scale from 1-10. Terricka shares her current struggles but focuses on the positives to help her through it. The cast vows to support her during this difficult time  in her life while sharing their own personal stories.

The women go on to discuss fashion and the growing trend of men wearing skirts. The cast shares their personal take on this trend while sharing rather they believe their husbands or boyfriends would ever wear a skirt as well. Chef Tre joins the cast and gives his perspective on the topic of men wearing skirts while serving strawberry shortcake.


WATCH MORE → https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLG...
